desc: The CurveTo element is used to draw a curve from the current drawing position to a point using control points.

controlX.desc: A number that specifies the horizontal position of the control point relative to the registration point of the parent display object.

controlY.desc: A number that specifies the vertical position of the control point relative to the registration point of the parent display object.

anchorX.desc: A number that specifies the horizontal position of the next anchor point relative to the registration point of the parent display object.

anchorY.desc: A number that specifies the vertical position of the next anchor point relative to the registration point of the parent display object.
